kpi.name: M1006C256

kpi_info.title: LFDPHONE FACH OR DCH TO PCH SUCCESS
kpi_info.use: The number of times when a UE identified as Legacy Fast Dormancy Phone has been successfully transferred to Cell_PCH or URA_PCH state. Also other state transition counters for example M1006C47, M1006C49 or M1006C114 are updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When the RNC receives Physical Channel Reconfiguration complete indicating successful transition to Cell_PCH or URA_PCH state from a UE that has been identified as LFDphone.

kpi.kpi_alias: LFDPHONE FACH OR DCH TO PCH SUCCESS
